metadata.description: Template for standardized daily news reports for traders and investors
metadata.target_audience: Active traders and investors seeking actionable market intelligence

section.name: executive_snapshot
section.description: Brief, impactful summary highlighting the most critical developments and their trading implications

include.item: Key price action or sentiment shift

section.name: key_catalysts
section.description: Major news events, earnings, policy changes, or market developments that could drive price action

section.name: technical_levels
section.description: Key support, resistance, and price targets based on recent price action

section.name: risk_factors
section.description: Primary risks that could disrupt the current narrative or trading thesis

section.name: trading_scenarios
section.description: Bullish, bearish, and base-case scenarios with specific price targets and triggers

scenario.name: bullish
scenario.triggers: Positive catalysts that could drive upside
scenario.targets: Specific price levels or percentage moves

scenario.name: base_case
scenario.description: Most likely outcome given current conditions

scenario.name: bearish
scenario.triggers: Risk events that could drive downside

section.name: market_context
section.description: Broader market conditions, sector rotation, and macro factors affecting the asset

section.name: data_signals
section.description: Key metrics, volume patterns, options flow, or sentiment indicators

section.name: key_events_calendar
section.description: Upcoming events, earnings, announcements, or data releases to monitor

length.bullet_points: use for key insights and levels

structure_format.tables: include summary tables for key levels and scenarios
structure_format.emphasis: bold for critical price levels and key insights

template_structure.footer: Summary table with key levels, targets, and risk parameters

accuracy.price_data: verify all price levels and technical analysis
accuracy.timeline: ensure event dates and timings are accurate

actionability.specific_levels: provide exact price levels, not ranges
actionability.clear_triggers: define specific conditions for scenario activation
actionability.risk_management: include stop levels and position sizing guidance

timeliness.market_hours: consider current market session and timing
timeliness.expiration_awareness: note when analysis may become stale
